Magmeld Emissary Prieta:
It is said that in ancient times those who were blessed by the gods, and those who have been cursed by them, began between a war. And the one who started this battle, was imprisoned somewhere in Marmalde... But something apparently went wrong.
What? Hmm... If you want to get in Magold, talk to the Verkhovna Rada, the Head of delegation of magolda. You will find him in the Village Hunters.
